overview: We handed the camera over to Penny and let her run wild! She took her girlfriends down to San Diego to stir up some trouble. After crashing a house party and giving a couple of hand jobs Sophie and Courtney found some strange dick to fuck. Back in LA, Penny hooked up with a guy in a tattoo shop, Julia made a booty call and Erin got pounded in a nightclub bathroom. This movie contains 8 scenes! Way to go Penny!!
title: Girls Night Out 2
